name: express-es6-rest-api
description: Starter project for an ES6 RESTful Express API

scripts.dev-work: cross-env NODE_ENV=work nodemon -w src --exec "babel-node src --presets es2015,stage-0,stage-1,stage-2"
scripts.dev-home: cross-env NODE_ENV=home nodemon -w src --exec "babel-node src --presets es2015,stage-0,stage-1,stage-2"

author: Jason Miller <jason@developit.ca>
